title: Ultimate Loaded Baked Potato Soup - Creamy Comfort Food for Family
promptIMG: Ultimate Loaded Baked Potato Soup, on plate, natural food photography, balanced sharp focus, zero blur throughout entire image, infinite depth of field, realistic food textures, modern kitchen background in sharp focus, natural lighting, kitchen countertop visible, even focus distribution, documentary food photography, natural sharpness --no blur, depth of field, bokeh, over-sharpening, artificial enhancement --quality 2 --raw --stylize 300
description: Indulge in the rich, creamy goodness of this Ultimate Loaded Baked Potato Soup. It's the perfect comfort food that warms your soul and delights your taste buds. Gather your loved ones and enjoy a bowl of this hearty soup today!
ingredients: 4 large russet potatoes, peeled and diced
instructions: In a large pot, melt butter over medium heat. Stir in flour and cook for 1-2 minutes.
Gradually whisk in chicken broth and milk until smooth.
Add diced potatoes and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer until potatoes are tender, about 15-20 minutes.
Stir in cheddar cheese, sour cream, and season with salt and pepper.
Serve hot, garnished with green onions and additional cheese if desired.
tips: For the best flavor, use freshly grated cheese and adjust seasoning to your taste.

structured_content.content: This Ultimate Loaded Baked Potato Soup is the epitome of comfort food, combining creamy textures with the heartiness of potatoes. Perfect for chilly evenings, it warms you from the inside out and is sure to become a family favorite.

note.label: Why You'll Love This Recipe
note.content:
• Quick and easy to make in under 30 minutes
  • Rich, creamy texture that satisfies
  • Perfect for cozy weeknight dinners
  • Uses simple ingredients you likely have on hand
  • Customizable with your favorite toppings

structured_content.content: I remember the first time I made this soup for my family; the aroma filled the house, and everyone gathered around the table, eager to dig in. It's a dish that brings us together and creates lasting memories.

• Main ingredient: Russet potatoes are ideal for their starchy texture that creates a creamy base.
  • Key seasonings/flavoring agents: Salt and pepper enhance the natural flavors of the soup.
  • Supporting ingredients: Cheese and sour cream add richness and depth.
  • Equipment needed: A large pot and whisk are essential for smooth cooking.

upload.context: A short description for the alt image of the ingredients preparation.

structured_content.content:
Preparation:
Peel and dice the potatoes, and measure out all ingredients before starting.
Cooking/Baking Process:
Follow the steps to create a creamy base and add the potatoes, simmering until tender.
Finishing Touches:
Stir in cheese and sour cream, then garnish with green onions before serving.

upload.context: A short description for the alt image of the cooking process.

note.label: You Must Know
note.content:
• Cook the flour for just a minute to avoid a raw taste.
  • Avoid overcooking the potatoes to maintain their texture.
  • The soup is ready when the potatoes are tender and the cheese is melted.
  • Store leftovers in the fridge and reheat gently on the stove.

structured_content.content: This soup is a staple in our household, often served during family gatherings. It's a dish that sparks joy and brings everyone together, making it a cherished recipe.
Customize your soup by adding crispy bacon, extra cheese, or even some spicy jalape√±os for a kick!
Pair this soup with a fresh garden salad or crusty bread for a complete meal. It's also great with a glass of white wine.
For a vegan version, substitute butter with olive oil, use plant-based milk, and skip the cheese and sour cream.

upload.context: A short description for the alt image of the final plated dish or variation.

note.label: Pro Tips
note.content:
• Use a hand blender for an ultra-smooth texture.
  • Let the soup sit for a few minutes to enhance flavors.
  • Timing is key; don't rush the simmering process.
  • Serve in bowls with a sprinkle of cheese for an impressive look.

structured_content.content: Embrace the joy of cooking with this Ultimate Loaded Baked Potato Soup. It's easy to make and even easier to love, so dive in and enjoy every comforting spoonful!
